title: Who is the voice actress of Kai'Sa?
body: Her voice is amazing. Anyone know who she is?

replies.body: Not sure exactly, and i don't think Riot has given out external information about Kai'Sa yet either. The voice actress does sound like she's from New Zealand or the United Kingdom, but that's just my speculation atm.
It sounds like Cara, however it also sounds a little like Maisie Williams...
She sounds familiar to Aqua from Kingdom Hearts so possibly Willa Holland?

> [{quoted}](name=vPseudo,realm=NA,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3LYgKYjE,comment-id=0005,timestamp=2018-03-13T04:17:45.857+0000)
>
> She sounds familiar to Aqua from Kingdom Hearts so possibly Willa Holland?

I just played Kai'Sa and thought the exact same! Like "i like it here, i might stay here" and i just "wait, that sounded extreme like aqua, need to look for the voice of her" {{champion:145}}
I think it is Hannah John‑Kamen.

> [{quoted}](name=Anoma10us,realm=EUW,application-id=FjGAIbRv,discussion-id=3LYgKYjE,comment-id=0006,timestamp=2018-11-14T18:34:36.829+0000)
>
> I think it is Hannah John‑Kamen.

Yeah i thought she sounded like it in ant man 2

Sounds like maiev shadowsong from warcraft... 
very similar
when is she released? Looks like a cool champ.
